channel.title: chlorophyll on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in chlorophyll on funPlantGenes

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: AcHZP45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcHZP45 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcHZP45 is a repressor of chlorophyll biosynthesis and activator of chlorophyll degradation in kiwifruit.

item.title: AUREA;AU
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g008930 Gene Symbol: AUREA AU Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: BnGLK1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g00410D Gene Symbol: BnGLK1a Gene Name: Golden2-like 1a Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A Golden2-like transcription factor, BnGLK1a, improves chloroplast development, photosynthesis, and seed weight in rapeseed.

item.title: BnGRF2a1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2a1 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: BnGRF2a2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2a2 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: BnGRF2b1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2b1 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: BnGRF2b2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2b2 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: BrFC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09005565 Gene Symbol: BrFC2 Gene Name: mutated form of BrFC2 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: A nonsynonymous homozygous mutation of BrFC2 results in increased heme and chlorophyll.

item.title: CcLOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA00g77830 Gene Symbol: CcLOL1 Gene Name: LSD ONE LIKE1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: CcLOL1, CaGLK2 and CcAPRR2 are highly diverged and are associated with immature fruit color variation in C.

item.title: CmHSFA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHSFA4 Gene Name: heat-shock factor A4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum CmHSFA4 gene positively regulates salt stress tolerance in transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmPPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C003069–70 Gene Symbol: CmPPR1 Gene Name: white-flesh Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: QTL analysis of flesh color intensity identified a candidate white-flesh gene (CmPPR1), one of two major loci determining fruit flesh color in melon.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY42 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 42 Genome: Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CrWRKY42 coregulates chlorophyll degradation and carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: FaDREB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaDREB2 Gene Name: dehydration-responsive element binding protein 2 Genome: Species: Festuca arundinacea Functional Descriptions: Ectopic Expression of FaDREB2 Enhances Osmotic Tolerance in Paper Mulberry.

item.title: Gh4CL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Gh4CL7-silencing cotton plants showed more sensitive to drought stress, probably due to decreased relative water content (RWC), chlorophyll content and antioxidative enzyme activity, increased stomatal aperture, and the contents of malondialdehyde (MDA) and hydrogen peroxide (H2O2).

item.title: GhWRKY27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY27 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 27 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhWRKY27, was isolated and characterized.

item.title: GhYGL1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_30325 Gene Symbol: GhYGL1d Gene Name: YELLOW-GREEN LEAF Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhYGL1d, a pentatricopeptide repeat protein, is required for chloroplast development in cotton.

item.title: GmDREB3

item.title: GmERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G016500 Gene Symbol: GmERF75 Gene Name: Ethylene-responsive factor gene 75 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The ABA-induced soybean ERF transcription factor gene GmERF75 plays a role in enhancing osmotic stress tolerance in Arabidopsis and soybean.

item.title: GmRCAβ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmRCAβ Gene Name: Rubisco activase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmRCAβ was expressed at higher mRNA and protein levels.

item.title: MaBAH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma05_g02600 Gene Symbol: MaBAH1 Gene Name: benzoic acid hypersensitive 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Proteasomal degradation of MaMYB60 mediated by the E3 ligase MaBAH1 causes high temperature-induced repression of chlorophyll catabolism and green ripening in banana.

item.title: MaMYB60
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma04_g00460.1 Gene Symbol: MaMYB60 Gene Name: Musa acuminata Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Proteasomal degradation of MaMYB60 mediated by the E3 ligase MaBAH1 causes high temperature-induced repression of chlorophyll catabolism and green ripening in banana.

item.title: MaNIP1

item.title: MaRZF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma02_p05740 Gene Symbol: MaRZF1 Gene Name: RING Zinc Finger 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: RING-type ubiquitin E3 ligase MaRZF1 interacts with chlorophyll catabolic enzyme MaSGR1, which promotes the ubiquitination and proteasomal degradation of MaSGR1, causing the green ripening of banana fruit under high temperature.

item.title: MaSGR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaSGR1 Gene Name: STAY-GREEN 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: RING-type ubiquitin E3 ligase MaRZF1 interacts with chlorophyll catabolic enzyme MaSGR1, which promotes the ubiquitination and proteasomal degradation of MaSGR1, causing the green ripening of banana fruit under high temperature.

item.title: MdMEK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Md02G1084700 Gene Symbol: MdMEK2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdMEK2–MdMPK6–MdWRKY17 pathway stabilizes chlorophyll levels by directly regulating MdSUFB in apple under drought stress.

item.title: MdMPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Md02G1004000 Gene Symbol: MdMPK6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdMEK2–MdMPK6–MdWRKY17 pathway stabilizes chlorophyll levels by directly regulating MdSUFB in apple under drought stress.

item.title: MdPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000177623 Gene Symbol: MdPSY1 Gene Name: phytoene synthase1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The first committed carotenoid pathway step in apple is controlled by MdPSY1 and MdPSY2, while MdPSY4 play little or no role in this respect.

item.title: MdPSY2

item.title: MdPUB24

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0031821 Gene Symbol: PoWRKY71 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 71 Genome: Species: Paeonia ostii Functional Descriptions: PoWRKY71 is involved in Paeonia ostii resistance to drought stress by directly regulating light-harvesting chlorophyll a/b-binding 151 gene.

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SbSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSOS1 Gene Name: salt overly sensitive 1 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: The SbSOS1 gene from the extreme halophyte Salicornia brachiata enhances Na+loading in xylem and confers salt tolerance in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SlARF10

item.title: SlBL4
